indicator_name: Number of countries that have national urban policies or regional development plans that (a) respond to population dynamics, (b) ensure balanced territorial development, (c) increase local fiscal space
target_name: Durch eine verstärkte nationale und regionale Entwicklungsplanung positive wirtschaftliche, soziale und ökologische Verbindungen zwischen städtischen, stadtnahen und ländlichen Gebieten unterstützen
un_custodian_agency:
United Nations Human Settlements Programme (UN-HABITAT)
United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA)
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
page_content: This indicator is affected by the 2020 revision - data availability is currently under review.
target: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning
